text: Urge to Kill is a studio album by Brainbombs, released on CD by Load Records in 1999. In 2010, Armageddon Records issued the album for the first time on vinyl LP. The album's lyrics are mostly about rape and murder from the perspective of the attacker. == Track listing == == References == Category:Brainbombs albums Category:1999 albums Category:Rock albums
title: Urge to Kill (Brainbombs album)
